item.description:
You are invited to our annual Winter Warm Up Weekend!  Located in beautiful North Conway, NH the Ski Wheelers Ski Club is one of the largest social and skiing clubs in NH.

This event is also crossposted on the Social Fun, TWIOP< and Ski Wheelers Meetup groups.

Built in 1863  as part of Russell’s Cottages and later named The Winwood Lodge, this beautiful Victorian offers a commercial sized kitchen, oversized dining room with fireplace, foyer, recreation room with piano, pool table, TV etc.  Large living room with woodstove and flat screen TV, 23 spacious bunk rooms and 9 bathrooms.

Winter Warm Up, is our season opener, our members come up this weekend to catch the first skiing and riding of the season, meet up with friends and other ski club members.  There are many activities happening in the Mount Washington Valley this weekend, as well as at our club.

Friday, December 7th:  Arrive anytime after 7:00pm for our meet and greet, bring an appetizer to share and get to know us.

Saturday December 8th:  Join everyone in the kitchen for a big breakfast, choose to make your own from a huge selection of fixings, or join in with whoever is cooking at that time.  (everyone cleans their own dishes)

 

Bretton Woods lift ticket for only $25 *

Optional Ski Bretton Woods Warm-Up Race included

 

Sign up for the race or just take advantage of the lift ticket discount!  Bretton Woods is a great place to ski! (*must be a guest of the club with required guest pass, or a member of the ski club, cash only - morning of the race.)

Saturday Evening:

      • 5:00 - 7:00 Hors d' oeuvres & Yankee Swap ($15 max)
      • 7:30 Dinner, Dinner Attire please!
      • 9:00 -1:00 Special event for club members and guests (details upon weekend registration)

Sunday December 9th: Buffet breakfast at the North Conway Grand Hotel and General Membership Meeting.

Extra Events: Bring an ornament for our Christmas Tree in the foyer. Cross country skiing and snow shoeing - weather permitting! 

The cost for the weekend is $65 plus lodging ($24/nt) and includes meet & greet, full breakfasts, Après-ski with appetizers, gourmet dinner Sat. evening and a whole lot of fun! (Lift ticket to Bretton Woods is additional).  All "Yes" RSVP's will be contacted with further details.
item.how_to_find_us: In the center of town, just after the movie theater on the right and the train station on the left, turn right onto Kearsarge Road (traffic light) Follow Kearsarge for about 1.5 miles. The Ski Wheelers’ lodge will be on your left.

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Winter Warm-up Weekend!
